data.name: Forever Home Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Original soundtrack of Forever Home. All files are in .mp3 format.
Composed by David Hunt, vocal work by Snowflake, guitar by Sean Murray.

Songs will be downloaded to the "Forever Home Soundtrack" folder in your Steam Directory:
[…]\Steam\steamapps\common\Forever Home\Forever Home Soundtrack

Or through Steam you can right-click on Forever Home and do properties. On the LOCAL FILES tab choose "Browse Local Files..."

data.about_the_game:
Original soundtrack of Forever Home. All files are in .mp3 format.
Composed by David Hunt, vocal work by Snowflake, guitar by Sean Murray.

Songs will be downloaded to the "Forever Home Soundtrack" folder in your Steam Directory:
[…]\Steam\steamapps\common\Forever Home\Forever Home Soundtrack

Or through Steam you can right-click on Forever Home and do properties. On the LOCAL FILES tab choose "Browse Local Files..."

data.short_description: Original soundtrack of Forever Home. All files are in .mp3 format. Composed by David Hunt, vocal work by Snowflake, guitar by Sean Murray.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows xp or greater
  • Processor: 500 Mhz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
  • Additional Notes: Computer must be able to play MP3 files.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: 500 Mhz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
  • Additional Notes: Computer must be able to play MP3 files.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: 500 Mhz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
  • Additional Notes: Computer must be able to play MP3 files.
